source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a dramatic skyscape scenery shot of a powerful thunderstorm raging at night. There is no single main subject because the focus is on capturing the immense scale and raw energy of the atmospheric event itself. The vast, dark sky is dominated by a colossal, churning mass of storm clouds, so dark they are nearly black. The scene is intermittently and violently illuminated by flashes of lightning; some are sharp, branching bolts that crackle low on the horizon, while others are diffuse sheet lightning that lights up the interior of the clouds, casting an ominous and beautiful purple glow across the turbulent cloudscape. A few faint, distant lights twinkle along the dark, flat horizon, providing a subtle sense of scale against the overwhelming power of the storm above.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video presents a dramatic skyscape scenery shot of a powerful thunderstorm raging at night. There is no single main subject because the focus is on capturing the immense scale and raw energy of the atmospheric event itself. The vast, dark sky is dominated by a colossal, churning mass of storm clouds, so dark they are nearly black. The scene is intermittently and violently illuminated by flashes of lightning; some are sharp, branching bolts that crackle low on the horizon, while others are diffuse sheet lightning that lights up the interior of the clouds, casting an ominous and beautiful purple glow across the turbulent cloudscape. A few faint, distant lights twinkle along the dark, flat horizon, providing a subtle sense of scale against the overwhelming power of the storm above.

generated_critique: The caption violates the instruction to avoid subjective adjectives that convey emotions by using the words "dramatic," "powerful," "raging," "violently," "ominous," "beautiful," and "overwhelming." Additionally, the description of lightning that "crackle" is an auditory detail, not a visual one, which goes against the instruction to describe only visual attributes. To improve the caption, remove these subjective and non-visual terms, focusing instead on objective descriptions of the storm, such as the color, shape, and movement of the clouds and lightning. For example, instead of "violently illuminated," use "intermittently illuminated," and instead of "ominous and beautiful purple glow," simply state it casts a "purple glow."
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video presents a skyscape shot of a thunderstorm at night. The dark sky is filled with a large formation of storm clouds, so dark they are nearly black. The scene is intermittently illuminated by flashes of lightning; some are sharp, branching bolts that appear low on the horizon, while others are diffuse sheet lightning that lights up the interior of the clouds, casting a purple glow across the cloudscape. A few faint, distant lights are visible along the dark, flat horizon.
